actions: Clears Heat, drains Dampness, drains Fire, resolves Fire toxicity and clears Heat topically.
Drains Damp-Heat, drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
Clears Heat,dries Dampness, drains Fire and detoxifies.
With Huang Lian and Huang Bai, for lesions and sores with redness, swelling and pain.
Regulates Qi, reduces accumulations and drains downward.

symptoms: Common in heavyset babies with a tendency to obesity
Rash usually appears on the face, scalp and neck, and can also spread to other areas.
Lesions are red with blisters and fluid
Sometimes the layers are simplified Below are scabs
Itching is strong and disturbing for the baby
sometimes urination is a little shorter than normal

contraindications: Do not apply to the face.

notes: Grind the ingredients into a fine powder. Mix with vegetable oil to form a paste or sprinkle the powder directly on the lesion. Apply once or twice daily.
